headline: ScaleReady announces multiple G-Rex速 Grants have been awarded to investigators at University of Minnesota's Center for Genome Engineering
summary: ScaleReady, in collaboration with Wilson Wolf Manufacturing, Bio-Techne Corporation (NASDAQ: TECH) and CellReady, today announced that three investigators at the University of Minnesota's Center for Genome Engineering have been awarded $665,000 of G-Rex速 Grant funding.
